001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.util.ArrayList;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Optional;
006import java.util.ServiceLoader;
007
008import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
009
010/**
011 * A container that will hold all resolved {@link JStachioExtension}s and consolidate them
012 * to a single instances of various services.
013 *
014 * @apiNote While this interface looks similar to {@link JStachioExtension} it is not an
015 * extension but rather an immutable bean like container. The methods are purposely java
016 * bean style (which is not the default in JStachio as JStachio prefers newer record like
017 * accessor method names) to support as many frameworks as possible.
018 * @author agentgt
019 */
020public interface JStachioExtensions {
021
022        /**
023         * A marker interface used for JStachio implementations that provide access to
024         * extensions.
025         *
026         * @author agentgt
027         *
028         */
029        public interface Provider {
030
031                /**
032                 * The available extensions.
033                 * @return The avaiable resolved extensions.
034                 */
035                public JStachioExtensions extensions();
036
037        }
038
039        /**
040         * Resolve from an iterable of extensions that usually come from some discovery
041         * mechanism like the {@link ServiceLoader} or a DI framework. <em>The order of the
042         * extensions is important and primacy order takes precedence!</em>
043         * @param extensions found extensions.
044         * @return bean like container of services.
045         */
046        public static JStachioExtensions of(Iterable<JStachioExtension> extensions) {
047                return DefaultJStachioExtensions.of(extensions);
048        }
049
050        /**
051         * Composite Config where the first config that returns a nonnull for
052         * {@link JStachioConfig#getProperty(String)} is used.
053         * @return config
054         */
055        JStachioConfig getConfig();
056
057        /**
058         * Composite Filter where the ordering of the filter is based on a combination of
059         * {@link JStachioFilter#order()} first and then the order in the iterable passed to
060         * {@link #of(Iterable)}.
061         * @return filter
062         */
063        JStachioFilter getFilter();
064
065        /**
066         * Composite Template finder where the first template finder that finds a template is
067         * used.
068         * @return template finder
069         */
070        JStachioTemplateFinder getTemplateFinder();
071
072        /**
073         * The orignal contained extensions excluding the composites.
074         * @return found services
075         */
076        List<JStachioExtension> getExtensions();
077
078        /**
079         * Finds a specific implementation using {@link Class#isAssignableFrom(Class)}.
080         * @param <T> the implementation type
081         * @param c the implementation type.
082         * @return an implementation if found
083         */
084        default <T extends JStachioExtension> Optional<T> findExtension(Class<T> c) {
085                return getExtensions().stream().filter(s -> c.isAssignableFrom(s.getClass())).map(c::cast).findFirst();
086        }
087
088}
089
090class DefaultJStachioExtensions implements JStachioExtensions {
091
092        private final List<JStachioExtension> services;
093
094        private final JStachioConfig config;
095
096        private final JStachioFilter filter;
097
098        private final JStachioTemplateFinder templateFinder;
099
100        private DefaultJStachioExtensions(List<JStachioExtension> services, JStachioConfig config, JStachioFilter filter,
101                        JStachioTemplateFinder templateFinder) {
102                super();
103                this.services = services;
104                this.config = config;
105                this.filter = filter;
106                this.templateFinder = templateFinder;
107        }
108
109        /**
110         * Create a container from service providers.
111         * @param it services
112         * @return bean like container of services.
113         */
114        static JStachioExtensions of(Iterable<JStachioExtension> it) {
115                List<JStachioExtensionProvider> svs = new ArrayList<>();
116                it.forEach(s -> svs.add(JStachioExtensionProvider.of(s)));
117
118                List<JStachioConfig> configs = new ArrayList<>();
119                List<JStachioFilter> filters = new ArrayList<>();
120                List<JStachioTemplateFinder> finders = new ArrayList<>();
121
122                for (var sv : svs) {
123                        var c = sv.provideConfig();
124                        if (c != null) {
125                                configs.add(c);
126                        }
127                }
128                JStachioConfig config = configs.isEmpty() ? SystemPropertyConfig.INSTANCE : new CompositeConfig(configs);
129
130                for (var sv : svs) {
131                        sv.init(config);
132                        @Nullable
133                        JStachioFilter filt = sv.provideFilter();
134                        if (filt != null) {
135                                filters.add(filt);
136                        }
137                        @Nullable
138                        JStachioTemplateFinder find = sv.provideTemplateFinder();
139                        if (find != null) {
140                                finders.add(find);
141                        }
142                }
143                JStachioFilter filter = JStachioFilter.compose(filters);
144                if (finders.isEmpty() && !config.getBoolean(JStachioConfig.REFLECTION_TEMPLATE_DISABLE, false)) {
145                        finders.add(
146                                        JStachioTemplateFinder.cachedTemplateFinder(JStachioTemplateFinder.defaultTemplateFinder(config)));
147                }
148                JStachioTemplateFinder templateFinder = CompositeTemplateFinder.of(finders);
149                return new DefaultJStachioExtensions(List.copyOf(svs), config, filter, templateFinder);
150        }
151
152        /**
153         * Composite Config
154         * @return config
155         */
156        @Override
157        public JStachioConfig getConfig() {
158                return config;
159        }
160
161        /**
162         * Composite Filter
163         * @return filter
164         */
165        @Override
166        public JStachioFilter getFilter() {
167                return filter;
168        }
169
170        /**
171         * Composite Template finder
172         * @return template finder
173         */
174        @Override
175        public JStachioTemplateFinder getTemplateFinder() {
176                return templateFinder;
177        }
178
179        /**
180         * Services
181         * @return found services
182         */
183        @Override
184        public List<JStachioExtension> getExtensions() {
185                return services;
186        }
187
188}
